txt.en: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, a band of trolls has claimed the Torrent-spires….\n\nYour mission is to reclaim the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn.
You have been tasked with reclaiming the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have come back from Zarkul-sulûn. Trolls have completely taken over the Torrent-spires! This can not stand! We must return to Zarkul-sulûn and reclaim the ruins!'
Some monsters in this mission will attempt a crushing attack, wounding and stunning anyone hit.
Your mission is to reclaim the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Zarkul-sulûn.
'Well done! With Zarkul-sulûn reclaimed, we may soon gain a greater foothold in Elderslade. We will make it to Gundabad soon enough!'
